"Tucano": "Ah, good. Glad to have you on board."
"Do you know about Regional Mags? They're the huge, Mag-shaped structures scattered all over the world."
"We used to have volunteer teams going out to check on them regularly, but lately they've been coming under attack from DOLLS..."
"Nobody's been to see them for a while, so I'm a little worried about them. I hope they haven't been damaged..."
"So, I'd like you to go and check on their status. Thanks in advance for your help."
